thread.title: Very good hotel!
thread.title_full: Very good hotel! - Review of Rosewood Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: hansamsterdam24
title: Very good hotel!
text:
Got booked here for a 3 days business meeting in February.
Never heard of this hotel group so I was curious.Googled it and it seemed to be a perfect choice.
Wow. It was a perfect choice....
What a great deluxe hotel..!
I was lucky to get a suite. Corner room with windos to the CCTV tower and the city. Great taste in decoration, lovely bed, superb bathroom.
Great dining options available too!
One of the best hotels I have been in Asia.
